title: Poster, after 1960
inscribed: Upper right corner in red: Entwurf  H.C. Pulver   Siebdruck  J.A. Schneider
description: Image is constructed entirely of text. In large red letters, from left to right across upper portion of sheet, Abend / verkauf / Basel. This is followed immediately by white letters that spell night / opening.  The spacing between the individual letters varies from relatively wide to very close.  Below at left, in smaller red letters, Mittwoch / 13, und 20. Dezember / bis 21 Uhr.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, after 1960.
after 1960. Screenprint on black wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-191.
